title: Typeface on a stamp
content:
Does anyone know what the typeface on this stamp is? Many thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804070433im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-09-11%20at%2011_3789.55.57.png)
author: woodwood

comments.content: This is probably **[Chevin Demi Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804070433/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/chevin-pro/)** [or Bold] by Nick Cooke (G-Type, 2003)
